data.name: Ticket to Ride - Pennsylvania
data.detailed_description:
In Pennsylvania, you'll experience another side of the fierce competition between railway companies of the Northeastern United States.

Faithful to the board game Ticket to Ride Pennsylvania, this map contains its lot of particular and thrilling rules:
  • Stock Shares system: most of the routes are owned by one or several Railroad companies. Each time you claim a route, earn a share of the company of your choice, and receive bonus points at the end depending on your shareholder position!
  • 2-player specific rules, with a dummy player receiving shares. Bear it in mind, it could disrupt your shareholder strategy!
  • Use Ferries to cross Lake Erie to Canada!

The struggle for Pennsylvania starts off! Strategy and competition reach their pinnacles: the most experienced players should find a challenge to their tastes, while new players shall enjoy the diversity offered by this map.

data.short_description: In a state full of railroad history, invest in the most profitable companies to develop your rail network. But do not let your opponents outbid you, or you risk losing the benefits of your investments!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
• OS: Windows Vista, Windows 7
  • Processor: Dual Core 1.6 GHz or better
  • Memory: 1GB (XP), 2GB (Vista), 2GB (Windows 7)
  • Hard Disk Space: 140 MB Free Space
  • Video Card: OpenGL 1.4 or higher
  • Sound: Windows supported Sound Card
